title: Everytime I log in it says im in a game and to reconnect.
body:
Every time I log in it says I'm in a game and to reconnect. The thing is I never left a game in the first place.
I can't play or do anything if I click reconnect the screen turns black and loads for a minute and says firewall error.

replies.body: I'm now on my level 3, trying to find a match, and I've legit got a queue time of 27;26 right now. We have had Match Found pop up over 10 times (no kidding, legit over 10 times), and never getting more then 6-7 say yes. So either a lot of trolls (and I mean A LOT of trolls) or Rito scores another point for shitty servers (y).

That's a shame, I still can't play. I hope the game I won at least gives me the lp I earned after how ever many hours its going to take. I'm on a losing streak and I'll be mad if the one win I got gets removed due to a bug haha.

I'm having the same problem after my team just voted to remake because our Annie was afk for a lil while at the start. Voted no because I don't really care about playing a 4 v 5, but the vote prevailed and we went back to the main screen. Tried to join a game and was told I was apart of an exsisting game, tried relogging as suggested by Seras, and that only made it worse because now I couldn't use my main screen (couldn't use the shops, make item sets while I waited, etc). Currently no idea what I'm meant to do. Hail the remake system!

Sounds like you experienced a ghost game. This happens when the game server you were playing on fails to communicate the game-end message to PVP.Net.

The ghost game will fix on itâ€™s own and _usually _ lasts a maximum of 2 hours after this occurs (though can sometimes be up to 8). Sometimes this issue can be fixed by relogging into League of Legends. Occasionally, restarting your computer may help. These actions force the client to request a new update. Otherwise you can really only wait it out.
